_notes.purpose: Configuration template for KomikTap data extraction
instructions: All selectors marked with [TO_BE_DETERMINED] MUST be filled with actual CSS selectors after inspecting komiktap.info HTML structure
Selectors marked with [OPTIONAL] can be set to null or empty string if the element doesn't exist on the website
URL patterns in 'urlPatterns' section are based on observed pattern from BRD - verify against actual website
Update 'lastUpdated' timestamp when making changes to this configuration
Increment 'version' following semantic versioning when making breaking changes
Test all selectors thoroughly before deploying to production
_notes.selector_source: Extracted from HTML samples in docs/assets/html/komiktap/

key_patterns_identified.homepage_layout: Uses .listupd container with .utao items for vertical card layout
key_patterns_identified.search_layout: Uses .listupd container with .bs items for grid card layout
key_patterns_identified.detail_layout: Uses .infotable for structured info, .seriestugenre for tags
key_patterns_identified.reader_layout: Simple #readerarea container with all images having .ts-main-image class
key_patterns_identified.pagination: Two patterns: .hpage for prev/next only, .pagination for full page numbers

implementation_notes: Status extraction: Parse from .statusind class name (e.g., 'statusind Ongoing' -> 'Ongoing')
Rating extraction: Numeric value from .numscore div
Detail page info: Iterate through .infotable tr rows, match label to extract specific fields
Chapter order: Chapters are listed from newest to oldest (data-num attribute available)
Image loading: Reader page loads all images at once with data-index attributes
Type detection: Can be extracted from .type class (e.g., 'type Manga', 'type Manhwa')
differences_from_crotpedia: Search is simple query-param based, not form-based advanced search
No textFields, radioGroups, or checkboxGroups in searchConfig
Chapter URL pattern uses '{slug}-chapter-{num}/' instead of '/baca/{slug}/'
Series detail URL uses '/manga/{slug}/' instead of '/baca/series/{slug}/'
